QueryViewSpec.Name: NTD Before Last Installment Date Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Displays RG rows where NTD is before last installment paid date
QueryViewSpec.Author: Mark Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select REVENUEID, c.LOOKUPID, RGID, NTD, LASTINSTALLMENTDATE, REVENUEDATE, STATUS from (select r.ID as REVENUEID, (select DATE from dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETNEXTINSTALLMENTINFO(r.ID,null)) as NTD, r.CONSTITUENTID, cast(r.DATE as DATE) as REVENUEDATE, r.LOOKUPID as RGID, r.TRANSACTIONTYPECODE, rs.STATUS, (select top 1 RGI.DATE from dbo.RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTPAYMENT RGP inner join dbo.RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT RGI on RGI.ID = RGP.RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENTID where RGI.REVENUEID = r.ID order by RGI.DATE desc) as LASTINSTALLMENTDATE from dbo.REVENUE r join revenueschedule rs on rs.ID = r.ID where (select DATE from dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETNEXTINSTALLMENTINFO(r.ID,null)) is not null ) cte left join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = CONSTITUENTID where NTD < LastInstallmentDate
